title: Pre-season 6 camera view
body: I think that the camera view in the pre-season is to close to the champion which makes it harder to see what is going on around you at close range.

replies.body:
I find that when i turn the screen off while playing it also makes it harder to see things,
but the solution to that is turing it on again.
so the solution for not seeing anything while zoomed in, 
is to zoom out!

What? Why are you playing at maximum zoom? Zoom out.

Also they haven't even changed the camera, last camera change was season 5, with the new Summoner's Rift update.
